data.title: Is tattooing allowed in Islam?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 88): If you take everything at face value off course you can't wear tattoo. But nowadays people are more practical about tattoo.

In Indonesia, the country where i live the art of tattooing is as old as language it self. In fact one of the oldest tattoo culture in the world can be fo...
